approach: Cross-device, screen size, and network testing

tests.name: Screen Size Compatibility
tests.details:
Screen Size Compatibility: 6/6 device configurations working
✅ iPhone SE (375x667)
✅ iPhone 12 (390x844)
✅ iPad (768x1024)
✅ Samsung Galaxy S21 (360x800)
✅ Samsung Galaxy Tab (800x1280)
✅ Desktop (1920x1080)

tests.name: Mobile Network Conditions
tests.details:
Mobile Network Conditions: 3/3 network conditions handled
✅ Fast Network (WiFi) (9161ms)
✅ Slow Network (3G) (8712ms)
✅ Intermittent Network (8286ms)

tests.name: Touch/Gesture Support
tests.details: Touch/Gesture Support: 4/4 gesture-triggered API calls working

tests.name: Mobile Performance
tests.details:
Mobile Performance: 0/3 performance tests acceptable for mobile
⚠️ Mobile API Response Time (8198ms - slow for mobile)
⚠️ Mobile Search Performance (8390ms - slow for mobile)
⚠️ Mobile Concurrent Requests (10749ms - slow for mobile)

tests.name: PWA/Mobile App Features
tests.details:
PWA/Mobile App Features: 4/4 PWA features available
✅ PWA Manifest Availability
✅ Service Worker Support
✅ Offline Capability Indicators
